data.title: Elias Canetti
data.meta_description: The Edythe Griffinger Portal is a curated selection of items from the Art and Objects Collection, Archives, and Library of the Leo Baeck Institute (LBI).
data.text:
Biographical/Historical Information

The German language novelist and author Elias Canetti was born in Bulgaria in 1905. Having lived mainly in Britain since World War II, he received the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1981. Elias Canetti died in Zurich in 1994.

Reproductions and Permissions

We welcome fair use of this content. Please credit the Leo Baeck Institute in your citation. For usage policies and to request higher resolution images, see Reproductions and Permissions.
